cards.description:
Draw 4 cards.
Discard any number of Colorless cards and gain 1 garticmod:Flight for each card discarded.

cards.name: Multi-Bottle Rockets
cards.description:
Discard any number of cards.
Deal 7 damage to a random enemy for each card
discarded + 1.

cards.name: Multi-Bottle Rockets+
cards.description:
Discard any number of cards.
Deal 10 damage to a random enemy for each card
discarded + 1.

cards.name: Pandamonium
cards.description: At the end of your turn, garticmod:Summon a garticmod:Crazy Panda that deals 10 damage and inflicts either 1 Weak or 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Pandamonium+
cards.description: At the end of your turn, garticmod:Summon a garticmod:Crazy Panda that deals 15 damage and inflicts either 1 Weak or 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Sheet of Paper
cards.description: At start of your turn Transforms into random stuff.

cards.name: Sheet of Paper+
cards.description: At start of your turn Transforms into random Upgraded stuff.

cards.name: Soaring Form
cards.description:
Ethereal.
At the start of your turn, gain [E] and 1 garticmod:Flight.

cards.name: Soaring Form+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and 1 garticmod:Flight.

cards.name: Supplicate To Inari
cards.description: Summon a garticmod:Three-Tailed White Fox.

cards.name: Supplicate To Inari+
cards.description:
Summon a garticmod:Three-Tailed White Fox.
Draw 1 card.
Gain 1 [E].

cards.name: Uncanny Hunger
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, garticmod:Unsummon.
If you did, gain 2 [E] and draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Uncanny Hunger+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of your turn, garticmod:Unsummon.
If you did, gain 2 [E] and draw 2 cards.

relics.name: Old Rod
relics.description: At the start of combat, shuffle 2 garticmod:Fish into your draw pile.

relics.name: Box of Crayons
relics.description: Whenever you discard 3 cards, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: The orange ones taste the best.

relics.name: Spiked Collar
relics.description: At the start of your next combat, choose 1 of 3 creatures to add to your garticmod:Party.
relics.flavorText: It was attached to a friend!

relics.name: Abase Crown
relics.description: The first cost 0 card you play after entering a Stance is played twice.
relics.flavorText: It was given as a gift. The receiver was not happy.

relics.name: Hidden Compartment
relics.description: At the start of combat, add a Smite and a Safety to your hand.
relics.flavorText: Don't forget how to open it.

relics.name: Lotus Pendant
relics.description: Whenever you enter a stance, gain 1 Mantra.

relics.name: Meat Treat
relics.description: At the end of the turn, if you don't have a Summon, Summon a Bait.
relics.flavorText: High quality meat, but not a sign of a good place to properly cook it.

relics.name: Party
relics.description: At the start of battle, summon the following creatures:

relics.name: Corrupted Meat
relics.description: Gain one [E] . At the start of each combat, summon a Small Spire Growth.
relics.flavorText: No one eats blighted meat, and there is a good reason for that.

relics.name: Fiberglass Rod
relics.description: Replaces Old Rod. At the start of each turn, shuffle 2 garticmod:Fish into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Plop!... Now to wait some more.

relics.name: Dark Pact
relics.description: While your HP is at or below 50%, draw 1 additional card at the beginning of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Unnatural speed payed for with lifeforce.

relics.name: Tranquil Void
relics.description: No more HP loss from Cleanest Mind, but the Max HP loss is increased by 1. Cleanest Mind costs 0 energy.
relics.flavorText: If you look into the void, then the void will look at you. If you try to embrace void, void will absorb you up.

relics.name: Worn Coat
relics.description: Whenever a garticmod:Fish enters your discard pile, gain 6 Block.
relics.flavorText: A reminder to take it easy sometimes.

potions.name: Copying Potion
potions.description: Add 3 createable in combat cards into your hand.

potions.name: Purple Stuff
potions.description: Swap your Draw and Discard piles, draw 4 cards.

potions.name: Darkling Milk
potions.description: If your Max HP is below its original value, gain 50% of it back.

keywords.name: Crazy Panda
keywords.description: Summon. At the end of your turn deals damage to a random enemy and applies Weak or Vulnerable.

keywords.name: Dire Wolf
keywords.description: A creature that attacks the enemy with the lowest health multiple times, affected by attack modifiers.

keywords.name: Flight
keywords.description:
Take 50% less damage from attacks.
Reduced by 1 when damaged or at the start of your turn

keywords.name: Hungry Fox
keywords.description: Summon. At the end of your turn deals damage to the lowest health enemy.

keywords.name: Resolute
keywords.description: Stance: While in Resolute, whenever you play an Attack, gain 2 Block.

keywords.name: Summon
keywords.description: Create a creature to fight for you this battle.

keywords.name: Three-Tailed White Fox
keywords.description: Summon. At the end of your turn, pick 1 of 3 random positive choices.

keywords.name: Unnate
keywords.description: Start each combat with this card at the bottom of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Wisdom
keywords.description: Stance: While in Wisdom, whenever you add a card to your draw or discard pile, add an additional copy.

keywords.name: [garticmod:AngryIcon] Block
keywords.description: Enter in Wrath for 2 turns after losing all this Block.

keywords.name: [garticmod:BlockingIcon] Block
keywords.description: Gain temporary Dexterity equal Blocked damage.

keywords.name: [garticmod:CurseIcon] Block
keywords.description: Apply Weak, Vunerable, and Frail to owner after losing all this Block.

keywords.name: [garticmod:DamageIcon] Block
keywords.description: Gain temporary Strength equal Blocked damage.

keywords.name: [garticmod:EnergyIcon] Block
keywords.description: Gain [E] after losing all this Block.

keywords.name: [garticmod:PlatedIcon] Block
keywords.description: Gain Plated Armor equal losed Block.

keywords.name: [garticmod:SpikyIcon] Block
keywords.description: Gain temporary Thorns to owner each losed unit Block.

keywords.name: [garticmod:VoidIcon] Block
keywords.description: Owner lose Strength until end of turn equal Blocked damage.

keywords.name: Consume
keywords.description: When you have Fish in hand, you will Exhaust Fish to pay [E] per Fish for this card's cost.

keywords.name: Fetching Fox
keywords.description:
A creature that has a 50% chance to perform one of these two actions at the start of each turn.
- Draws you a card.
- Steals a card from you, returning it at the start of next turn.

keywords.name: Fire Imp
keywords.description: A creature that deals 3 damage to a random enemy whenever you play an Attack.

keywords.name: Fish
keywords.description: Fish are random Colorless cards that grant a small benefit, replace themselves, and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Fixed Damage
keywords.description: Not affected by effects.

keywords.name: Glass Armor
keywords.description: At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to your stacks of Glass Armor. Receiving unblocked attack damage removes all Glass Armor.

keywords.name: Mirrored Fox
keywords.description:
A creature that has a 50% chance to perform one of these two actions at the end of each turn.
- Deals its damage to a random enemy.
- Gain its Block to you.

keywords.name: Mischievous Fox
keywords.description:
A creature that has a 50% chance to perform one of these two actions after you play a card.
- Deals its damage to you.
- Deals its damage to a random enemy.

keywords.name: Paper
keywords.description: One form of "Sheet of Paper".

keywords.name: Party
keywords.description: A group of Summons that join you at the start of each battle.

keywords.name: Unsummon
keywords.description: Remove one of your Summons.
